meanings.definition: Make (something) necessary as a result or consequence.
meanings.sent1: The heavy rain necessitated an umbrella.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard necessitated passing the exam.
meanings.sent3: His forgetfulness necessitated tying a string around his finger.
meanings.sent4: The broken elevator necessitated taking the stairs.
meanings.sent5: The low battery necessitated charging the phone immediately.

meanings.definition: Require (something) because it is essential or unavoidable.
meanings.sent1: The long journey necessitated packing extra snacks.
meanings.sent2: Safety regulations necessitated wearing a helmet.
meanings.sent3: Her love for chocolate necessitated hiding it from her siblings.
meanings.sent4: The cold weather necessitated wearing a thick coat.
meanings.sent5: The traffic jam necessitated finding an alternate route.
